thread.title: Liverpool Confirm Klopp As New Manager
thread.title_full: Liverpool Confirm Klopp As New Manager

author: Nurudeen Obalola
title: Liverpool Confirm Klopp As New Manager
text:
Headlines / Liverpool Confirm Klopp As New Manager Liverpool Confirm Klopp As New Manager 
Liverpool have appointed former Borussia Dortmund coach Jurgen Klopp as their new manager. Klopp replaces Brendan Rodgers, who was sacked earlier this week after a series of poor results. The Reds confirmed the appointment of the German on their official website on Thursday in a statement. 
“Liverpool Football Club are delighted to announce Jürgen Klopp has been appointed as the club’s new manager,” the club wrote. 
“The German coach has signed a deal to take the helm at the Reds and will be presented at a press conference at Anfield on Friday morning.”
